Datasource.Parameter: ( SELECT OGC_FID,geometry, landuse AS type FROM pg_landuse ) AS data
( SELECT OGC_FID,geometry, leisure AS type FROM pg_leisure ) AS data
( SELECT OGC_FID,geometry, natural AS type FROM pg_natural ) AS data
( SELECT OGC_FID,geometry, amenity AS type FROM pg_amenity) AS data
( SELECT OGC_FID,geometry, landuse AS type FROM pg_landuse) AS data
( SELECT OGC_FID,geometry, leisure AS type FROM pg_leisure ) AS data
( SELECT OGC_FID,geometry, natural AS type FROM pg_natural) AS data
( SELECT OGC_FID,geometry, amenity AS type FROM pg_amenity) AS data
( select OGC_FID, waterway as type, geometry from ln_waterway where waterway in ('river', 'canal')) AS data
( select OGC_FID, waterway as type, geometry from ln_waterway where waterway in ('river', 'canal', 'stream')) AS data
( select OGC_FID, waterway as type, geometry from ln_waterway where waterway in ('river', 'canal', 'stream', 'ditch', 'drain')) AS data
( select OGC_FID, waterway as type, geometry from pg_water) AS data
( select OGC_FID, waterway as type, geometry from pg_waterway where waterway in ('riverbank')) AS data
( SELECT OGC_FID,geometry, natural FROM pg_natural WHERE natural in ('water', 'pond')) AS data
( select OGC_FID, natural as type, geometry from pg_natural_water) AS data
( select OGC_FID, place as type, geometry from pg_island) AS data
( SELECT OGC_FID, geometry FROM pg_building) AS data
( SELECT OGC_FID, geometry, aeroway as type FROM pg_aeroway where aeroway in ('apron', 'runway', 'taxiway')) AS data
